description: Convert LUIS JSON and/or QnAMaker JSON file into .lu file.

options.qna_file: [Optional] QnA Maker JSON input file name
options.qna_alteration_file: [Optional] QnA Maker Alteration input file name
options.out_folder: [Optional] Output folder for all files the tool will generate
options.skip_header: [Optional] Generate .lu file without the header comment
options.stdout: [Optional] Write output to stdout only. Specifying this option will not write any generated content to disk
